name: @yggdrasil-au/wlampctl-cli
description: Dev environment for all my personal and private web development projects based on my astro template
author: samarixum

scripts.build-linux: cd source/xampp-ui/new && cargo build --release && pnpm exec shx cp target/release/wlampctl* /opt/lampp/
scripts.build-win: cd source/xampp-ui/new && cargo build --release && shx cp target/release/wlampctl* ../../xampp-build/Built/installed-xampp/
